      • accept

        public boolean accept(File file)
        Description copied from interface: Deployer
        Does the current deployer accept the given file. The accept method must not check file existence, as it may disable notification on file deletion.
        Specified by:
        accept in interface Deployer
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        Returns:
        true if the file is accepted by the current deployer, false otherwise

      • onFileCreate

      • tryToStartUnstartedBundles

        private void tryToStartUnstartedBundles(org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle)
        Iterates over the set of bundles and try to start unstarted bundles. This method is called when holding the monitor lock.
        Parameters:
        bundle - the installed bundle triggering this attempt.

      • open

        public void open(Collection<File> files)
        It's a good practice to install all bundles and then start them. This method cannot be interrupted.
        Specified by:
        open in interface Deployer
        Overrides:
        open in class AbstractDeployer
        Parameters:
        files - the set of file.
